title: Affiliate: Register MyAffliates (request)
description: Register a new affiliate in MyAffliates

address_postcode.description: Within 20 characters and may not contain '+'.

address_street.description: Within 70 characters, with no leading whitespaces and may contain letters/numbers and/or any of following characters '.,:;()@#/-

citizenship.description: Name of the country that the user is citizen of, 2-letter country code.

commission_plan.description: Commission plan selected by affiliate 2 RevShare, 4. Turnover

country.description: Name of the country that currently reside, 2-letter country code.

currency.description: Currency of affiliate that wants to work with.

date_of_birth.description: Birth date of affiliate user trying to register

first_name.description: The official first name of the affiliate. Within 2-50 characters, use only letters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes.

last_name.description: The official last name of the affiliate. Within 2-50 characters, use only letters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes.

non_pep_declaration.description: Indicates client's self-declaration of not being a PEP/RCA (Politically Exposed Person/Relatives and Close Associates).

over_18_declaration.description: Indicates client's self-declaration of being over 18 in age

phone.description: Registered phone number of the affiliate. Starting with `+` followed by 8-35 digits, allowing hyphens or space.

phone_code.description: Phone code without the starting + sign

promote_eu.description: Indicates client is going to promote its account to EU or not.

receive_marketing_emails.description: Indicates client has agreed to receive marketing emails or not.

social_media_url.description: Social media URL of the affiliate trying to register.

tnc_accepted.description: Indicates client has agreed to the terms and conditions.

tnc_affiliate_accepted.description: Indicates client has agreed to the terms and conditions for affiliates.

user_name.description: Username of affiliate, will be unique everytime

website_url.description: Social media URL of the affiliate trying to register.

whatsapp_number.description: Whatsapp phone number of the affiliate. Starting with `+` followed by 8-35 digits, allowing hyphens or space.

whatsapp_number_phoneCode.description: Whatsapp code without the starting + sign

loginid.description: [Optional] The login id of the user. If left unspecified, it defaults to the initial authorized token's login id.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field. Maximum size is 3500 bytes.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
